Voted “Best Personal Injury Lawyers” 10 Years in a Row.

Located in Camden, Maine, Peter Thompson & Associates has earned a reputation as one of the top law firms in the State for personal injury and wrongful death claims. Our award-winning attorneys recovered over $15,000,000 for our clients last year alone and were listed in U.S. News & World Report’s “Best Lawyers in America” and “Best Law Firms” guides. While we are proud of the outstanding results we have obtained and the national recognition we have received, even more important to us is our clients’ satisfaction with our services. In surveys completed by our clients, they gave us 4.9 out of 5 stars for “communication,” “responsiveness” and “overall satisfaction” with 100% stating they “would recommend” our firm to others. “To be a good lawyer, you must do more that just fight aggressively for your clients and achieve excellent results; you must also consistently address your clients' needs and concerns in a timely manner and develop relationships based on trust and respect,” Peter Thompson says simply. Our firm and its reputation have been built around this philosophy. At Peter Thompson & Associates, every client matters to us.

Helping You Find Justice

If you suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can turn to the legal professionals at Peter Thompson & Associates to help you obtain the justice you seek. For more information, you can receive a free initial consultation about your claim by contacting our law office or visiting our website.
